profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.8 Embedded files - EF key
profile.description: A file specification dictionary, as defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, 7.11.3, may contain the EF key, provided that the embedded file is compliant with either ISO 19005-1 or this part of ISO 19005.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: A file specification dictionary, as defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, 7.11.3, may contain the EF key, provided that the embedded file is compliant with either ISO 19005-1 or this part of ISO 19005.

error.message: An embedded file does not comply to either ISO 19005-1 or ISO 19005-2
